strings.name: SMCoSE YouthMappers
strings.description: YouthMappers chapter at Sokoine University of Agriculture
strings.extendedDescription: A Chapter comprising of Environmental sciences and management students and Geography studies under the dept. of Geography and  we will be using mapping techniques, based on systems concepts and theories, can be used to facilitate, explore, and capture the different understandings of the relationships, perspectives, and boundaries involved in environmental sustainability to obtain a more complete comprehension of the concept and develop plans for action.
